title: I Wish the Jury Had Not Sentenced My Family’s Killer to Death
description: How a killer’s death sentence can bring new pain to families of victims.
dc:creator: Sharon Risher
category: Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School (Parkland, Fla)

media:content.media:credit: Kennedi Carter for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: The author, Sharon Risher, with a photograph of her mother, Ethel Lance, who was killed in the Charleston, S.C., church shooting in 2015.
